dc_title_s: Map of Ottowa River Basin showing availabilty of underground water
dc_description_s: Map side also contains legend and explanation of map symbols.|Scale bar lower left corner.|Text includes information about generalized stratigraphic sequence of the rocks in the Ottawa Basin, quality of underground water, and summary.|"Prepared by ALFRED C. WALKER, Geologist, Ohio Division of Water, from data compiled by Lawrence R. Brunstetter".
